name: Monster Rush (Shia Pixel)
description:
Description:

In Monster's Rush, the player takes on the role of a monster that has been awakened from a long slumber. 

The monster must navigate through a series of levels, using its unique abilities to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies. 

Along the way, the player can collect special cards that enhance the monster's abilities and unlock new powers.

Game Art:

Aseprite

Piskel

Gdevelop Asset Store

Movement:

Spacebar - Jump

Right Arrow Key - Right

Left Arrow Key - Left

Game Design:

Ny'eshia Jackson

Sound Design:

Ny'eshia Jackson
